attributes.action: There needs to be an investigation into the biased remain reporting by the BBC
attributes.additional_details:
A petition is urgently needed to force an investigation by the government that will hopefully result in the breakup and sell off of the corrupt paedophile luvies club and their bully boy licence fee tax collection department too, good riddance!!

#ENDBBC!
attributes.background: There needs to be an investigation into the biased Remain reporting by the publically owned BBC that is still continuing even after the referendum result.  A petition is needed to force an investigation by the government that will hopefully result in the breakup and sell off of the corupt BBC!!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter, which includes complaints about the impartiality of the BBC.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us
